Title: VisualCron - web client
Description:
VisualCron, www.visualcron.com, is an advanced scheduler and automation tool. VisualCron has a WinForms interface built on the VisualCron API.

This projects is a proof of concept web client built upon the VisualCron API.

The project was originally built by VisualCron developers as a test to provide a realtime/responsive web client.
HomeWiki:
Project Description



VisualCron, www.visualcron.com, is an advanced scheduler and automation tool. VisualCron has a WinForms interface built on the VisualCron API.

This projects is a proof of concept web client built originally by VisualCron developers as a test to provide a realtime web client.

This project is provided as-is but we are open to suggestions and new developers.

Features
  • Support for touch devices (hold down finger on Task or Job row)
  • Connect to a local or remote VisualCron Server
  • Realtime update of events
  • Remember connection settings with OAuth
  • Connect to many servers at once
  • Sort Jobs
  • Filter Jobs
  • Run Jobs/Tasks
  • Stop Jobs/Tasks

New development

This project may occasionally be updated by VisualCron developers but if you are a developer and want to contribute on this project please contact us.

Technical details
  • .NET Framework 4.0
  • C#
  • VisualCron API http://www.visualcron.com/download.aspx
  • SignalR https://github.com/SignalR/SignalR
  • Mentalis (cryptography) http://www.mentalis.org/soft/projects/crypto/
  • JSON Serializer http://json.codeplex.com/
  • DotNetOpenAuth http://www.dotnetopenauth.net/
  • SQL CE 4 http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17876
